events.description: Emitted when someone disconnected the bot from the channel

events.description: Emitted when deafenOnJoin is true and the bot was undeafened

methods.name: leave

typedefs.name: DMPErrors
typedefs.description:
The DMPErrors short messages. Following modes exists:

  • Unknown: There was an Unknown Error.,
  • QueueDestroyed: The Queue was destroyed.,
  • NothingPlaying: There is currently no Song playing in the Voice Channel.,
  • UnknownVoice: The provided Member is not in a Voice Channel.,
  • ChannelTypeInvalid: The provided Channel is not a Voice Channel.,
  • VoiceConnectionError: There was an Error while starting the Voice Stream,
  • NoVoiceConnection: There is no Queue#connection [you should use Queue#join()] first.,
  • UnknownRepeatMode: The provided RepeatMode was not valid.,
  • ResourceNotReady: The AudioResource was not ready.,
  • InvalidGuild: The provided Guild was invalid.,
  • SearchIsNull: The was no YouTube song found by that query.,
  • InvalidSpotify: The was no Spotify song found with that link.,
  • InvalidPlaylist: There was no Playlist found with that link.

params.name: leaveOnEmpty
params.description: If it should leave on empty voice channel

params.name: timecode
params.description: If url with timecode (?t=) provided, will play from that moment

params.name: index
params.description: If the index was provided, it will add the song after the provided index in the Queue

props.name: time
props.description: If it should add time near the ProgressBar

params.name: timecode
params.description: If url with timecode (?t=) provided, will play from that moment

params.name: time
params.description: If it should add time near the ProgressBar

typedefs.name: RepeatMode
typedefs.description:
The queue repeat mode. Following modes exists:

  • OFF = 0
  • SONG = 1
  • QUEUE = 2
